content: there s a dutch saying called het leven is een feest maar je moet zelf de slingers ophangen which translates to life s a party but you have to hang your own bunting i fully agree to this statement so why wait untill it s your birthday to decorate the house with some cute bunting flags if you can celebrate life everyday the everyday birthday bunting pattern is an easy beginner friendly crochet pattern for making bunting flags the triangles are created individually and then connected by chain stitches
